Summary: heard noise, looked up and saw strange light
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
trends: There have been no other sightings in Carrollton
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting on the steps,and heard a strange noise. Kind of like a chain saw but different, like the sound you hear space ships make on tv, that zing zing, but some what like a chain saw too. Just unusual. I live on a farm, which can be quite noisy. The cows had been balling, you know mooing. When this noise started they got very quiet. Spooky. Then there was a motercycly, that just came out the road way, then back and forth, several times. Just short distance then back again, may be five or six times. That is when I felt something kind of pull my attention up to the sky. As I looked up I saw 2 lights, about the size of car lights hoovering side by side in the sky. They started to move towards me, then all of a sudden they were gone, like a switch was turned off. Then again my attention was drawn, this time to the right, about 1 quarter of a mile away. There the lights were again, then zip gone again, right back in front of me. Then they rotated, one over the other. I jumped up and ran in the house scared silly. But I ran to the front window and looked out again to see where the lights were. They were slowly coming towards me. I had the tv on and the sound went off. I started to get a tingly sensation on my neck and arms, my 2 year old son was sleeping on the couch, sound asleep, this was unusual for him this time of the evening,he was normaly up running around. I could feel a pulling sensation on my body, kind of like all the hair on my skin was standing on end. I then ran to the back of the house to see if I could see the lights going over, but they were gone. I ran back out side the cows had started mooing again, the motor cycle was gone, the sound on the tv was back. I was very shaken by this, of coures everyone thinks I'm nuts but I know there was something there. That is my story. Since then I have only seen one other unsual sighting it only lasted a few seconds, so I won't call this a ufo
